Portfolio Heading

Landing Page Features

The Landing Page template by includes:

  • Bootstrap v3.2.0
  • jQuery v1.11.0
  • Font Awesome v4.1.0
  • Working PHP contact form with validation
  • Unstyled page elements for easy customization
  • 17 HTML pages
